TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XDocumentType extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode

summary.span: 表示 XML 文档类型定义 (DTD)。

span.span: Represents an XML Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 中的数据类型定义（DTD）是用于执行以下操作的一种方法：Data Type Definitions (DTD) in XML are a way to do the following: - 在有限范围内验证 XML 树。Validate XML trees to a limited extent. - 展开 "实体"，它是一种文本替换形式。Expand entities, which is a form of text replacement. - 提供默认属性。Supply default attributes. 此类表示 DTD 的 XML 概念。This class represents the XML concept of a DTD. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 中的 DTD 支持受到限制。DTD support in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] is limited. 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 将展开内部实体，但它将不解析外部实体引用，除非使用关联 的 来加载 XML 树。[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] will expand internal entities by default, but it will not resolve external entity references unless an with an associated is used to load the XML tree. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 不会对照 DTD 验证文档，但你可以根据需要使用验证 执行 DTD 验证。will not validate a document against a DTD, but you can use a validating to perform DTD validation if necessary. 若要针对 XML 架构验证 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 树，请使用 方法。To validate an [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] tree against an XML schema, use the method. 当文档包含 DTD 中定义的实体引用时，将在创建 XML 树时展开这些引用。When a document contains entity references that are defined in a DTD, the references are expanded upon creation of the XML tree. 但是，在序列化或保存 XML 树时，会保留扩展实体的内容;实体引用不是。However, when you serialize or save the XML tree, the content of the expanded entities is preserved; the entity references are not. DTD 中的默认属性将具体化为 XML 树中的常规属性。Default attributes from the DTD will be materialized as regular attributes in the XML tree. 在从 DTD 中具体化默认属性后，无法确定该属性是否为 DTD 中的默认属性。After a default attribute from the DTD is materialized, there is no way to determine that the attribute was a default attribute from the DTD. 您可以使用包含内部 DTD 的 XML 文档填充 XML 树。You can populate an XML tree with an XML document that contains an internal DTD. 然后，XML 树将包含一个 节点。The XML tree will then contain a node. 序列化或保存树时，内部 DTD 也将作为文档的一部分进行保存。When you serialize or save the tree, the internal DTD will also be saved as part of the document.

span.span: LINQ to XML

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数主要在创建 XML 树的深层副本时在内部使用。This constructor is primarily used internally when making a deep copy of an XML tree.

MemberSignature.Value: public XDocumentType (string name, string publicId, string systemId, string internalSubset);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string publicId, string systemId, string internalSubset) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, publicId As String, systemId As String, internalSubset As String)
public: XDocumentType(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ publicId, System::String ^ systemId, System::String ^ internalSubset);
new System.Xml.Linq.XDocumentType : string * string * string * string -> System.Xml.Linq.XDocumentType

param.name: name
param.span: 一个包含 DTD 的限定名的 ，此名称与 XML 文档的根元素的限定名相同。

span.span: A that contains the qualified name of the DTD, which is the same as the qualified name of the root element of the XML document.

param.name: publicId
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含外部公共 DTD 的公共标识符。

span.span: A that contains the public identifier of an external public DTD.

param.name: systemId
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含外部专用 DTD 的系统标识符。

span.span: A that contains the system identifier of an external private DTD.

param.name: internalSubset
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含内部 DTD 的内部子集。

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for an internal DTD.
Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有内部 DTD 的文档。The following example creates a document with an internal DTD. 当它创建 对象时，它将指定 DTD 的限定名称（Pubs）以及包含内部子集的字符串。When it creates the object, it specifies the qualified name of the DTD (Pubs), and a string that contains the internal subset. 由于文档不使用公共或专用外部 DTD，因此 `publicId` 和 `systemId` 设置为 `null`。Because the document does not use a public or private external DTD, the `publicId` and `systemId` are set to `null`. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.NextNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 此示例生成以下输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ]> Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的内部子集。

span.span: Gets or sets the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义的 (DTD) 的内部子集。

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含内部子集的包含 DTD 的文档。The following example creates a document with a DTD that contains an internal subset. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset) ``` 此示例生成以下输出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义的 (DTD) 的名称。

span.span: A that contains the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含 DTD 的 XML 文档。The following example creates an XML document that contains a DTD. 创建文档后，它将使用此属性检索 DTD 的限定名称。After creating the document, it retrieves the qualified name of the DTD using this property. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name) ``` 此示例生成以下输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Pubs ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: virtual property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 获取此节点的节点类型。

span.span: Gets the node type for this node.
The node type.
For objects, this value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于派生自 的所有类都包含 属性，因此你可以编写在 的具体子类集合上操作的代码。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 然后，你的代码可以测试集合中每个节点的节点类型。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性检索 对象的节点类型。The following example shows the use of this property to retrieve the node type for an object. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType.ToString()) ``` 此示例生成以下输出：This example produces the following output: ``` DocumentType ```

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的公共标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the public identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的公共标识符。

span.span: A that contains the public identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML 文档使用外部公共 DTD，则此属性将包含外部 DTD 的公共标识符。If an XML document uses an external public DTD, this property will contain the public identifier of the external DTD.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SystemId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SystemId : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的系统标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的系统标识符。

span.span: A that contains the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML 文档使用外部专用 DTD，此属性将包含外部 DTD 的专用标识符。If an XML document uses an external private DTD, this property will contain the private identifier of the external DTD. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个引用外部专用 DTD 的 XML 文档。The following example creates an XML document that refers to an external private DTD. DTD 没有内部子集。The DTD does not have an internal subset. 对 构造函数的调用反映了外部专用 DTD 的使用。The call to the constructor reflects the use of the external private DTD. 它为内部子集传递 `null`。It passes `null` for the internal subset. ```csharp string pubsDtd = @" "; File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd); string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, "Pubs.dtd", null), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); doc.Save("Pubs.xml"); // Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. XmlReaderSettings xrs = new XmlReaderSettings(); xrs.ProhibitDtd = false; xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD; xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto; XmlReader xr = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Load(xr); XDocumentType dt = doc2.Document.DocumentType; Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId); ``` ```vb Dim pubsDtd As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd) Dim target As String = "xml-stylesheet" Dim data As String = "href='mystyle.css' title='Compact' type='text/css'" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc _ .FirstNode _ .AddBeforeSelf(New XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, "Pubs.dtd", Nothing)) doc.Declaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true") doc.Save("Pubs.xml") ' Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. Dim xrs As XmlReaderSettings = New XmlReaderSettings() xrs.ProhibitDtd = False xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto Dim xr As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(xr) Dim dt As XDocumentType = doc2.Document.DocumentType Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId) ``` 此示例生成以下输出：This example produces the following output: ``` SystemId:Pubs.dtd ```
